long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🛠️ Restore Full Functionality on Sites that Restrict It

This extension re-enables right-click, copy, paste, and text selection on websites that block these features. Some sites disable these functions to prevent users from copying or pasting content, which is a misuse of browser capabilities. These features are meant to allow website owners to offer their custom context menus, not to limit user access to the browser's default functionality.

✨ How to Use the Extension
Simply click the toolbar button if a site blocks right-click. That’s all it takes! This extension uses a non-persistent background script, meaning it only uses resources when the toolbar button is pressed. This makes it a more efficient option compared to other alternatives.

📌 Additional Use Cases

📷 Copy images from hosting sites.
🎥 Copy videos from various video or clip platforms.
🚀 Features

🖱️ Restores the default context menu based on the content (e.g., image or video context menus).
✂️ Re-enables copy and paste on sites that block these functions (unblocks clipboard access).
🔄 One-click toggle to enable or disable the extension.
⚙️ Automatically activates on user-specified websites.
🔕 Minimizes distractions by muting "window.alert" and other interrupting notifications.
📝 Unblocks text selection (overrides "user-select", "-moz-user-select", and "-webkit-user-select" properties).
🎯 Unblocks pointer events that have been disabled ("pointer-events").
🖼️ Restores access to images within HTML5 custom elements.
🆓 Open-source and available on GitHub.
📱 Unblocks touch events on Android (including "touchstart" and "touchend").
